text: 3.8 Stt 12.3, 18.18, 22.18, Apo 3.5, 3.25, Lom 9.17 Bɨlel God ne anɨgɨl nɨgak, kɨdek binɨb Juda mel okok Jisas takaw teplep ak gos lɨnɨgɨnɨgel, yad nɨgen binɨb suŋtep yad okok yenɨgabal agɨl gos nɨgak. Nɨgek, buk Baybol kɨl tɨkɨl Eblaham nop takaw teplep won ak anɨb agak, God nep nɨŋɨd, binɨb okok mɨdupsek gek tep gɨnɨgab agak.
